author: rjollos
msg: * Consistently place the ''Cancel'' button to the right for all existing templates.

* Copied `ticket_delete.html` to `bh_ticket_delete.html`, modified the button styling and moved the ''Cancel'' button to the right. The work of converting the template to bootstrap will be completed in #424. The ticket delete page hasn't been tested at all due to the issues described in #427.

* Copied `attachment.html` to `bh_attachment.html`, modified the button styling and moved the ''Cancel'' button to the right. The work of converting the template to bootstrap will be completed in #425.
